meanings.definition: A person who aspires to achieve a particular goal or position.
meanings.sent1: Many young aspirants dream of becoming successful doctors one day.
meanings.sent2: The competition was tough, with many aspirants vying for the scholarship.
meanings.sent3: The group of aspirants waiting nervously for the results resembled a flock of anxious birds.
meanings.sent4: In the race of life, the aspirants sprint towards their ambitions with unwavering determination.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the energy of hopeful aspirants, each with a unique dream in their heart.

meanings.definition: Aspiring or seeking to achieve a particular goal or position.
meanings.sent1: The aspirants students were eager to learn and grow in their chosen field.
meanings.sent2: She admired his aspirants attitude towards his career, always striving for improvement.
meanings.sent3: The cat watched with curiosity as the aspirants squirrel tried to reach the top of the tree.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was dotted with aspirants buildings, each reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The aspirants minds of the young students were filled with endless possibilities and dreams.
